information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin pack to monitor Microsoft Azure SQL Server using Azure CLI or RestAPI.**

Available host templates and related services:

|Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlServer|
|---|
|Server-Status|

This pack provides a host discovery rule.

**Plugin pack pour superviser Microsoft Azure SQL Server via la CLI ou la RestAPI Azure.**

Modèles d\'hôte disponibles et leurs services :

|Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlServer|
|---|
|Server-Status|

Ce pack fournit une règle de découverte d\'hôte.

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module >= 19.10.1

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Azure SQL Server
